snippet: The City of Phoenix and a developer who was poised to demolish a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed home have reached an agreement that will put any work on hold while a search continues for a buyer.
abstract: City of Phoenix and a developer planning to demolish a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed home reach agreement that will put any work on hold while a search continues for a buyer that will preserve the house.
lead_paragraph: The City of Phoenix and a developer who was poised to demolish a Frank Lloyd Wright-designed home have reached an agreement that will put any work on hold while a search continues for a buyer.

headline.seo: Demolition on Hold for Frank Lloyd Wright House
headline.main: Arizona: Wright House Wins Some Time
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Wright House Wins Some Time
